name: No Fly Zone (BennyWoolbert)
description:
Controls:

Vehicle Style Control:

W&A: Move Forward and Backward

A&D: Turn Left and Right(Rotate)

L-mouse/L-Ctrl: Fire weapon

R-mouse/L-Alt: Fire Turret(If there is any)

Space: Switch Weapon between Minigun or Cannon, A reload disk will appear to represent the changing process. During Weapon change, you cannot fire a weapon.

Note: For the Cannon, which also has 5 seconds reload, whenever it is swapped in it always needs 5 seconds to load the first shot.

PowerUps:

AttackPowerUp: If picked while having the minigun, the minigun will shoot three bullets every time instead of one (three streams of bullets!)

                           If picked while having the cannon, the cannon shell will be able to go through an infinite number of enemies, effectively killing all enemies in a straight line.

TurretPowerUp: Once picked, a minigun turret will spawn, you can aim it with the mouse, and fire with R-mouse/L-Alt, it won't be targeted, but has 30 HP, can be destroyed.

One PowerUp has a 50/50 chance to spawn after every wave, and of that 50%, AttackPowerUp has a 40% chance, TurretPowerUP has a 10% chance.

Enemies:

Red Enemies are Drones, they wander aimlessly and do nothing, except killing the player upon contact.

Blue Enemies are Warriors, wonder randomly but always aims for the player, they have 4 attacks each with 25% of being the next.
